name: Threshold
blurb: Survive, Build, Fight, and Explore. The world is on the threshold of change, will you step through?

rewards.reward: Coal Miner:   Never underestimate a piece of coal. Through it, a vast empire can rise up from nothing.  \r\n\r\n ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website.

Surveyor:   Do the lands please you? Is this where you shall begin your new life. Yes. This place shall do nicely.   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website

Steam Engine Operator:   Yours are the hands that keep civilization moving. It is your work that provides power for the machines and light for our homes.   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website

Machine operator:   You manufacture the wares that civilization needs to survive. Tools, weapons, armor, you craft them all with diligence and care.   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website

Shop Owner   You make good living selling wares to commoners and nobles alike. You are well on your way to becoming somebody in this world.   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Adventurer:   You brave the wilds so others do not have to. You dig deep into abandoned mines and explore vast forgotten fortresses. All this you do, but you need not do it alone. For what is an adventurer without a faithful sidekick?   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Alpha Beta and Full Game for 1 friend   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Warrior:   Where others dare not tread you and your compatriots walk unafraid. You fight as a pack, undivided and indivisible. You defend civilization with your lives, and your lives are not easily taken!   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Alpha Beta and Full Game for 3 friends   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Noble:   You bear a heavy burden and carry it gracefully. Let the presents share your woes; you may even be bothered to solve them. So long as they pay their taxes of course.   ~   Help the developers name an NPC in the game!   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

University Professor:   To fill minds is your task, and you do it well. Scientists, warriors, emperors, all owe their knowledge and skill to your tutelage. Your great teachings will have a great impact on the coming age.   ~   Work with the developers to design a perk for the game!   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Inventor:   Your works are sought after across the entire world. They help men build lives, or sometimes take them.  You increase the power of a civilization, be it for good or ill\u2026   ~   Work with the developers to design a weapon or tool for the game!   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Necromancer:   Your dark powers are not used for the good of society. No, quite the opposite you oppose civilization. Horrifying monsters and evil creatures are your tools to subdue the growing blight of civilization. Work with the developers to design a monster for the game!   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name on the in game Credits

Emperor/Empress:   Do you rule with an iron fist or a gentle hand? Either way your life will have far reaching impact, and your actions will not be forgotten. No one is more powerful nor more respected.   ~    For this blessing you get your Likeness on the in game currency   ~   Alpha Access   ~   Beta Access   ~   Full Game   ~   Threshold Concept Art Digital Download   ~   Threshold Soundtrack Digital Download   ~   Get your name on the backers list on our website   ~   Get your name in gold in game Credits
